context.title: Image user should not be 'root'
context.description: Running containers with 'root' user can lead to a container escape situation. It is a best practice to run containers as non-root users, which can be done by adding a 'USER' statement to the Dockerfile.
context.remediation: Add 'USER <non root user name>' line to the Dockerfile

raw.Title: Image user should not be 'root'
raw.Description: Running containers with 'root' user can lead to a container escape situation. It is a best practice to run containers as non-root users, which can be done by adding a 'USER' statement to the Dockerfile.
raw.Message: Specify at least 1 USER command in Dockerfile with non-root user as argument
raw.Resolution: Add 'USER <non root user name>' line to the Dockerfile
